text:
Created attachment 29314
List of the broken links.

I loaded my development project into a new version of Eclipse with the Web Tools Platform included.  It happens that Ant 1.8.3 with the manual is unpacked into my project space.  Eclipse reports 11 broken links in the Ant manual and 33 in the ant-contrib manual.  (Not sure if the ant-contrib problems need to be in a separate bug report.  If so, let me know and I'll open it.)

Text file listing the problems is attached.
creator: barlock@us.ibm.com

text:
Fixed the links for the Ant manual.

git:5d3888d2a1ec7f7ef655a1e6e119ce14fb4432c8 


AntContrib is a seperate project and not part of Apache.
creator: jan@materne.de
